lead.p: undefined — A variable which does not have it’s value defined.

example.heading: undefined
In some situations you might en up with the sting 'undefined'
example.p: When checking typeof an undefined variable, the result is a string.
example.code: var a; console.log(a === undefined); // true console.log(typeof a === undefined); // false console.log(a === 'undefined'); // false console.log(typeof a === 'undefined'); // true
